key.name: window-width
key.description: Default width of the application window

key.name: window-height
key.description: Default height of the application window

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the window should start maximized

key.name: default-record-type
key.description: The default DNS record type to select when the application starts

key.name: last-dns-server
key.description: The last DNS server used for queries

key.name: default-dns-server
key.description: The default DNS server to select when the application starts (empty for system default)

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: The preferred color scheme: system, light, or dark

key.name: query-history-limit
key.description: Maximum number of queries to keep in history

key.name: last-version-shown
key.summary: Last version that showed what's new dialog
key.description: Version number of the last time the what's new dialog was shown

key.name: default-reverse-lookup
key.description: Whether reverse lookup should be enabled by default for new queries

key.name: default-trace-path
key.description: Whether trace path should be enabled by default for new queries

key.name: default-short-output
key.description: Whether short output should be enabled by default for new queries

key.name: auto-clear-form
key.description: Whether to automatically clear the domain field after performing a query

key.name: query-timeout
key.description: Maximum time to wait for DNS query responses

key.name: show-query-time
key.description: Whether to display how long queries take to complete

key.name: show-ttl-prominent
key.description: Whether to prominently display TTL values in query results

key.name: compact-results
key.description: Whether to use a more condensed result display layout

key.name: enable-doh
key.description: Whether to use DNS-over-HTTPS for queries

key.name: doh-provider
key.description: The DNS-over-HTTPS provider to use (cloudflare, google, quad9, custom)

key.name: custom-doh-endpoint
key.description: Custom DNS-over-HTTPS endpoint URL

key.name: enable-dnssec
key.description: Whether to automatically validate DNS responses with DNSSEC

key.name: show-dnssec-details
key.description: Whether to display detailed DNSSEC chain of trust information
